entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 08 March 2023
